message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: The appeal stage has already been cancelled.
The appeal stage has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_PROCESS_CANCELLED
message.locale: This appeal process has already been cancelled.
This appeal process has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_XRV_ACTIVE_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be deleted for an active appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be deleted for an active appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_XRV_EXPIRED_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be deleted for an expired appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be deleted for an expired appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_XRV_CANCELLED_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be cancelled for a cancelled appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be canceled for a canceled appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_ACTIVE_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: An active appeal process cannot be cancelled.
An active appeal process cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_EXPIRED_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: An expired appeal process cannot be cancelled.
An expired appeal process cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_MODIFY_XRV_ACTIVE_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: Appeal stage cannot be modified on an active appeal process.
Appeal stage cannot be modified on an active appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_MODIFY_XRV_EXPIRED_APPEAL_PROCESS
message.locale: Appeal stage cannot be modified on an expired appeal process.
Appeal stage cannot be modified on an expired appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_APPEALSTAGE_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Appeal stage must be selected.
Appeal stage must be selected.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_XRV_PAST_STARTDATE
message.locale: An Appeal stage cannot be added to an expired appeal process.
An Appeal stage cannot be added to an expired appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_PROCESS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An appeal process already exists for this date.
An appeal process already exists for this date.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_STARTDATE_PAST
message.locale: Start Date must be on or after today.
Start Date must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALSTAGE_FIRSTAPPEALSTAGE_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: First Appeal stage must be selected.
First Appeal stage must be selected.

message.name: ERR_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_STARTDATE_MUST_BE_PRESENT
message.locale: Start Date must be entered.
Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDISSUESTAGE_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_PAST_STARTDATE
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be added on an active appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be added on an active appeal process.

message.name: ERR_ADDISSUESTAGE_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be added to a cancelled appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be added to a canceled appeal process.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYISSUESTAGE_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_PAST_STARTDATE
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be modified on an active appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be modified on an active appeal process.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYISSUESTAGE_ISSUEAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: An appeal stage cannot be modified on a cancelled appeal process.
An appeal stage cannot be modified on a canceled appeal process.
